text:
I'm Drue Gilbert (they/them): maker, full-stack web developer, educator, and proud queer nerd.
Welcome to my portfolio, a place to showcase some of my personal projects and do some creative coding.
As Gandalf wisely said, "All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us"—and I've decided to spend mine building, learning, and creating.
↓
Punch it, Chewie! (Scroll to view portfolio.)
↑
tech: JavaScript, JSON, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap Icons

text:
Web app that aids in running a Chaos Mage character, from the 13th Age roleplaying game, in combat.
All randomized class features are automated, and character options persist across sessions.
tech: React, Babel, JavaScript, JSX, JSON, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

text: Dynamically generates map pins and modals by parsing EXIF metadata in uploaded images.
tech: JavaScript, Google OAuth + Maps + Drive APIs, HTML, CSS

text:
CLI tool and web app that generates pseudo-random pairs of students,
while tracking and reducing repeat pairings.

Simple web app for keeping track of knitting rows in repeating patterns.
Utilizes localStorage to persist data across sessions.

Version 1.0 of my portfolio.
This is the original version of my portfolio, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
It was a fun project to experiment with creative coding and color.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, p5.js, Bootstrap Icons

text:
Hackbright Academy, Remote | 2021 - 2024
- Led cohorts of aspiring developers, delivering comprehensive training in full-stack development.
- Created and maintained curriculum content, focusing on real-world applications and industry best practices.
- Mentored students, fostering their growth from novices to job-ready software engineers.
tech: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, JavaScript, React, AWS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

text:
Remote | 2020 - 2021
- Developed and maintained internal tools, web portals, and data visualizations.
- Collaborated with clients to design and implement custom solutions for rapid deployment.
tech: Python, SQL, JavaScript, D3/Plot, HTML, CSS, Shell Script

text:
Coding Dojo, Oakland CA | 2019
- Provided personalized guidance to students, helping them overcome coding challenges.
- Assisted in the development and delivery of coding bootcamp materials, enhancing student engagement and learning outcomes.
tech: Python, Flask, Django, Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, Express, Angular, MySQL, MongoDB, Mongoose, AWS, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

text:
Thank you for taking the time to explore my portfolio! I had fun building it.
If you'd like to collaborate, have any questions, or just want to chat about coding,
feel free to reach out: +1-719-257-3447 | drue.gilbert@gmail.com
Let's boldly go and build something amazing together!
